title: Quarkus failing to update using gradle with error: This operation is only supported for Gradle projects
body:
### Describe the bug

I've got a Gradle/Quarkus project (using the gradle wrapper, and using the Kotlin gradle DSL) that's on Quarkus 3.4.1.

I'm trying to update Quarkus using the `quarkus update` command. I've also tried it using `./gradlew quarkusUpdate`, but both result in the same thing.

The update fails with the root exception being:
```
Caused by: java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException: This operation is only supported for Gradle projects
	at io.quarkus.devtools.project.update.rewrite.operations.UpgradeGradlePluginOperation.single(UpgradeGradlePluginOperation.java:26)
```

The project uses gradle, so I'm a bit stuck as to where to look next for clues.

Full stack trace below:

```
Instructions to update this project from '3.4.1' to '3.5.2':
Recommended Quarkus platform BOM updates:
Update: io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-bom:pom:3.4.1 -> 3.5.2

Resolved io.quarkus:quarkus-updates-recipes:1.0.8 with 1 recipe(s) to update from 3.4.1 to 3.5.2 (initially made for OpenRewrite GRADLE_KOTLIN_DSL plugin version: 5.40.6)

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':quarkusUpdate'.
> Failed to apply recommended updates

* Try:
> Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output.
> Run with --scan to get full insights.
> Get more help at https://help.gradle.org.

* Exception is:
org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskExecutionException: Execution failed for task ':quarkusUpdate'.
        at org.gradle.api.internal.tasks.execution.ExecuteActionsTaskExecuter.lambda$executeIfValid$1(ExecuteActionsTaskExecuter.java:149)
```

### Expected behavior

`quarkus update` completes and upgrades to the latest version.

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

 Darwin Kernel Version 23.0.0: Fri Sep 15 14:42:42 PDT 2023; root:xnu-10002.1.13~1/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

openjdk version "21" 2023-09-19 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 21+35-2513) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 21+35-2513, mixed mode, sharing)

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.4.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

8.3

### Additional information

_No response_
